alert.note: Alert for Florence (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 17 at 4:13AM CDT until October 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LAKE-EFFECT SNOW SHOWERS CONTINUING TODAY... .A cold north flow across Lake Superior will generate periods of lake-effect snow showers today. The combination of snow and some blowing and drifting snow, and this being the first significant snowfall of the season will likely result in hazardous travel conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected along with some blowing and drifting snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in western Florence county, with lesser amounts in the east. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Florence County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: This being the first significant snowfall of the season, plan extra travel into any trips today. Be sure to slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
